channel.title: Zenith 667/718 Shops
channel.description: Recently I tried editing some shops in my source, however when I tried changing the unpackedshops.txt nothing happened and I couldnt find any other file that contained the item codes for the shops. Could someone help me?

item.title: Zenith 667/718 Shops
item.dc:creator: @noobs1234111 noobs1234111
item.description:
@noobs1234111 wrote:

You have to delete packedshops then compile :fp: then run your server. If you continue having this problem pm me. I’m also using zenith and though people say it’s really buggy (that it is) if you have a brain and the ability to fix the minor issues then it’s really a great source. All my players love it Pm me if you need help with zenith in general :P.

~Andrew

Read full topic
